flawed_nl_solution:
Mara has 150 - 40 = <<150-40=110>>110 cards.
Janet has 110/2 = <<110/2=55>>55 cards since Mara has twice as many as Janet.
Brenda has 55 - 9 = <<55-9=47>>47 cards since Janet has 9 cards more than Brenda.
Therefore, they all have 110 + 55 + 47 = <<110+55+47=212>>212 cards.
#### 212

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 46, not 47. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
